data.actual_result: A softcrash of discord that reloads UI and then recconects to server (sometimes I also got some error messages but I can't 100% reproduce them)
data.expected_result: The stream either plays or closes and the message is hidden again
data.short_description: Desktop Application Crashes on loading stream content in blocked message
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone blocked so their messages will not be shown - Have them link you a twitch stream (possibly other media also) - Open the blocked message - Click play on the stream and imidiatly close the blocked message
